resources.string: The theme of SpringSpree 2019 is KALAKSHETRA. Reflecting the fact that NIT Warangal has been the platform for students to learn, perform and excel in 64 forms of Kala (art) for the students. NIT Warangal ensures to groom the budding artists while encouraging and respecting their forms of arts and cultures. NIT Warangal strives to spread the message of art amongst the youth and doing everything to ensure the glorious future for art.

SpringSpree is the flagship annual cultural fest of NIT Warangal. Ever since its inception in 1978, SpringSpree has only grown to be bigger and better. It not only provides a platform for students all over the country to express themselves using various forms of art, it also encourages new cultural events and highlights the new forms of art. It is a rich cultural extravaganza. The Proshows organized during SpringSpree are performed by Nationally acclaimed artists and are the most awaited events of the Spree.
